timeline.bodyText:
Should be net/minecraft/util/JsonSerializableType
What's the difference between this and JsonSerializable?
timeline.author: Juuxel

replies.bodyText:
Yes, should be in util.
Its an odd class, as its just holds an instance of JsonSerializable, wasnt too sure what to go with here.
replies.author: modmuss50

timeline.author: Juuxel

replies.bodyText: Yes, I kinda forgot about that everwhere. Thats what I get for moving around projects with diffrent conventions lol
